articles.title: Bridgerton ladies-man Jonathan Bailey admits he hid his sexuality - Daily Mail
articles.description: The British star came out in 2018, two years before finding fame as silver-tongued ladies-man Anthony in racy Netflix period romp Bridgerton.
articles.content:
Bridgerton star Jonathan Bailey says he reluctantly concealed his sexuality in order to further his career after being told a publicly gay actor would struggle to win roles.
